revised_title: Albert Marcel Germain René Portevin: A Tribute to His Contributions in Steel Metallurgy
tldr: This article is a biographical memoir of Albert Marcel Germain René Portevin, a renowned scientist in the field of steel metallurgy. Portevin made significant contributions to understanding the behavior of tungsten and molybdenum steels, including the corrosion cracking of steel under the influence of internal stresses and the solidification of foundry alloys. His work had a lasting impact on the field of metallurgy and the development of steel materials.
